name: Moon Defence (WilgotW)
description:
Defend your Spacecraft  from Invading Aliens!

Made for The Lost Cartage  Game Jam 3

Can  you beat the boss? ;)

Controlls:

w,a,s,d to walk, left mouse button to shoot. 1, 2 ,  3 to switchh between bought weapons

(Warning: currenty a  bug   when  switching weapons)

Thank you for playing!

Made by WilgotW
